bug.author: znation
bug.summary: Banding effect on grayscale images in annotation and evaluation
bug.description: See screenshot. The image doesn't quite display properly in the UI. The same image is positioned above in Preview for comparison.

comments.comment: I'm unable to repro this. Do you have an SFrame to repro this?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/abhishekpratapa>@abhishekpratapa</denchmark-link> I can't find the dataset I used to repro it originally, and none of the datasets I have now can repro it. I think it may have been a weird corner case, and/or an underlying issue with the data. Without the repro I don't think there is much we can do. Let's close this issue for now, and reopen if it comes up again.
